title: Children/juvenile
description: For a juvenile audience, not specifically for any educational purpose.

title: Young adult
description: For a teenage audience, not specifically for any educational purpose.

title: Primary and secondary/elementary and high school
description: Kindergarten, pre-school, primary/elementary or secondary/high school education.

title: College/higher education
description: For universities and colleges of further and higher education.

title: Professional and scholarly
description: For an expert adult audience, including academic research.

title: ELT/ESL
description: Intended for use in teaching English as a second language.

title: Adult education
description: For centres providing academic, vocational or recreational courses for adults.

title: Second language teaching
description: Intended for use in teaching second languages, for example teaching German to Spanish speakers.
